name: Free Block Puzzle Hotel - Train Your Brain
name_original: Free Block Puzzle Hotel - Train Your Brain
description:
Train your logic and brain for FREE!

5 different game types!

Block Puzzle Hotel is a tetris type block puzzle game. Simple and easy to play - use your logic to move the different style blocks to fit in the field and collect points!

Choose from 5 different game types:

Classic
Plus
Bomb
Survival
Hexa

Compete with you FRIENDS and players all over the world - become the king of block puzzle!

Free Block Puzzle Hotel - Train Your Brain is made specially for you!
